document_data.name: Safia
document_data.mainbody: '''Safia''', also called the '''Light-Fingered''', was a [[tasked genie|tasked]] [[artist genie]] living among the [[Jann of the Haunted Lands]] in the [[Burning Lands]] of [[interior Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: Safia was quite beautiful. She stood nearly {{SI|7|ft|long=yes}} tall.
document_data.Activities: Safia never ceased singing and playing her [[lute]] in the presence of the sheik's guests.
document_data.Relationships: She was the favorite concubine of Sheikh [[Ardasir al-Darah]] of the jann.
